about_the_game:
August, 1945. The twilight of the world's deadliest conflict. A small platoon of Japanese naval soldiers arrives on a deserted island. The captain, steadfast in his loyalty to his country, vows to fight the enemy and defend his homeland. However, with starvation looming and the enemy nowhere in sight, there are murmurs throughout the ranks that every last man will be dead long before the enemy arrives on the island's shores. As the last of the supplies run out, the soldiers grow delirious from starvation. One night, one of the soldiers beholds an impossible sight: a restaurant which has suddenly appeared on the island in the middle of the night.



An intense first person shooter experience with puzzle elements and a rich story, Manny's 2 puts players in the shoes of Ishikawa, an outcast soldier within the ranks of the Imperial Japanese Navy. With three different weapons and multiple new characters, each with different stories, Manny's 2 is sure to bring customers plenty of enjoyment for about the cost of a combo meal.



We here at Manny's hope to give you the best experience money can buy. We are committed to providing you with the best customer service and sincerely hope that you enjoy your experience with us once again. Order a meal, pull up a chair, and welcome back to Manny's!

name: Manny's 2 Demo
short_description: August, 1945. A small Imperial Naval platoon guarding a deserted island. With starvation looming on the horizon, the men begin to see and hear strange calls from the bowels of the island. What mysteries await below the surface and will the soldiers survive long enough to discover them?
supported_languages: English, French, Spanish - Spain, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America
